name: Turtle Revolution
description:
A game where you manipulate computer files to your advantage.

Made for the Major Jam 5 in 7 days.

BY DOWNLOADING TURTLE REVOLUTIONT, YOU AGREE THE GAME IS ALLOWED TO READ EXISTING COMPUTER FILES. THE GAME WILL NEVER DELETE OR EDIT ANY EXISTING FILES.

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEYS: Movement

R: Retry in Certain Areas

E: Next Dialogue 

Credits:

Standalone File Browser

Sounds from Jonas Tyroller's Free Resources Pack and Pixabay

TypeWritterEffect

Art style heavily inspired by Will You Snail
